Container.Name: Owncast
Container.Overview:
Owncast is a self-hosted live video and web chat server for use with existing popular broadcasting software.
Admin login: The credentials for the admin site: 'http://SERVERIP:PORT/admin' are Username: 'admin' and Password: 'abc123' (please note that the password is also your streaming key and should be changed to something very strong).
Streaming URL: The default streaming URL for example for OBS is: rtmp://SERVERIP (the stream key is the admin password).
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version from Owncast is available.
Also visit the Homepage of the creator and consider Donating: https://owncast.online/
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: Preferred Version
Config.Description: Preferred Owncast version goes here (set to ‘latest’ to download the latest and check on every startup if there is a newer version available)

Config.Name: Extra Startup Parameters
Config.Description: Enter extra startup parameters if needed here (leave empty if not needed)
